title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cloud Resilience in the AI Era (HMC307)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI 时代的云弹性 (HMC307)
abstract: Your AI strategy is only as secure as your cloud foundation. AI-enabled cyberattacks surged 47% in 2025, while AI adoption creates explosive data growth across cloud estates. Organizations face threats moving at machine speed: corrupted training datasets, compromised agent outputs, and rapidly expanding attack surfaces. Traditional cloud snapshots can't keep pace. This session provides a practical framework for cloud resilience when AI amplifies threats. Learn how to gain visibility into AI-driven attack vectors, implement recovery strategies matching the speed of incidents, and protect your data lifecycle from both malicious attacks and agent mistakes while safely operationalizing AI. This presentation is brought to you by Rubrik, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 您的 AI 策略的安全性取决于您的云基础设施。2025 年，AI 驱动的网络攻击激增了 47%，而 AI 的采用在云环境中创造了爆炸性的数据增长。组织面临着以机器速度移动的威胁：被破坏的训练数据集、受损的代理输出以及快速扩展的攻击面。传统的云快照无法跟上步伐。本会议为 AI 放大威胁时的云弹性提供了一个实用框架。了解如何洞察 AI 驱动的攻击向量，实施与事件速度匹配的恢复策略，并在安全地将 AI 投入运营的同时保护您的数据生命周期免受恶意攻击和代理错误的影响。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Rubrik 为您呈现。
